properties.Name: ActivityType
properties.Description:
Activity Type is a larger classification of Activities that enables them to be grouped for presentation or analysis.

For example, the Activity of 'gardening' might be classified by the Activity Type of 'Home Interests' to differentiate those interests from professional or other interests.     

This serves the purpose of grouping interests in larger classifications to give an accurate picture of the consumer in various contexts.

Ex:
Activity =  "Cooking"
Activity Type = "Personal Interest"

Activity =  "Golf"
Activity Type = "Personal Sports

Activity =  "Mutual Fund Investing"
Activity Type = "Finance"

Each organization will identify, define and track a specific set of AIOs to gather information about, define consumers and make decisions.

Columns.Name: ActivityTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Activity Type.

Columns.Name: ActivityTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of the Activity Type.

Columns.Name: ActivityTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of the Activity Type.

Properties.Description:
Activity Type is a larger classification of Activities that enables them to be grouped for presentation or analysis.

For example, the Activity of 'gardening' might be classified by the Activity Type of 'Home Interests' to differentiate those interests from professional or other interests.     

This serves the purpose of grouping interests in larger classifications to give an accurate picture of the consumer in various contexts.

Ex:
Activity =  "Cooking"
Activity Type = "Personal Interest"

Activity =  "Golf"
Activity Type = "Personal Sports

Activity =  "Mutual Fund Investing"
Activity Type = "Finance"

Each organization will identify, define and track a specific set of AIOs to gather information about, define consumers and make decisions.
